name: Noughts and Crosses (feniks_gaming)
description:
Simple Noughts and Crosses or as it's know in the US "Tic Tac Toe " I used to learn Godot. I made it along my youtube channel where I document my learning. 

You play using a mouse left click to select and place your shapes. Currently you play just by yourself or swapping places with someone. I will be adding some audio in a future.
